tool_description: Validates that the original risk assessment and policy underwriting align with the current claim type and circumstances.

policy_risk_category.description: Original risk category assigned during underwriting

underwriting_notes.description: Original underwriting notes and risk factors

error_messages: Risk category invalid: Specified risk category is not recognized in underwriting system.
Claim type mismatch: Claim type does not align with policy coverage types.
Underwriting notes missing: Underwriting notes are required for risk assessment validation.
Validation failed: Unable to validate risk assessment against claim circumstances.
usage: Input policy_risk_category, claim_type, and underwriting_notes to validate consistency between original risk assessment and current claim. Returns validation results and any risk assessment discrepancies.

risk_aligned.description: Whether claim aligns with original risk assessment

risk_discrepancies.description: List of discrepancies between risk assessment and claim

validation_summary.description: Summary of risk assessment validation results
